      static void reorientRobot(double theta)
      This method turns the robot by the magnitude indicated by the input parameter The input angle will always be brought down to the minimum angle needed to turn and it can adjust itself in both cw and ccw directions.

    • Method Detail

      • DoubleLocalizer

        public void DoubleLocalizer()
        Localize the machine using 2 light sensors: 1. With the robot heading roughly in positive y direction, drive forward until both sensor detected x axis 2. Reset odometer value (Y coord) and the heading according to X axis 3. Drive back 20cm to ensure the machine is in the 3rd quadrant relative to the origin 4. turn 90 degree to the right. With the robot heading roughly in positive x direction, drive forward until both sensor detected y axis 5. Reset odometer value (X coord) and the heading according to Y axis 6. Drive back 20cm to ensure the machine is in the 3rd quadrant relative to the origin, then navigate to the original point. 7. At the end of the method, the vehicle should be located at (0,0) with a heading of 0 degree

      • travelToLine

        public void travelToLine()
        Travel to the front until the 2 light sensors poll a black line

      • reorientRobot

        public static void reorientRobot(double theta)
        This method turns the robot by the magnitude indicated by the input parameter The input angle will always be brought down to the minimum angle needed to turn and it can adjust itself in both cw and ccw directions.
        Parameters:
        theta - RADIAN value of the angle that the robot will adjust its orientation For adjusting clockwise the parameter should be positive, for ccw adjustment please input a negative radian

      • travelToOrigin

        public void travelToOrigin()
        This method takes in the robot's current location and navigate the robot to the (0,0) point Then it adjust the robot's orientation into zero degree (facing positive Y axis)
